Topic.Title: I am a math teacher and I am about to die

Posts.EditableText:
[img:1uum3d31]http://i65.tinypic.com/6t1x21.png[/img:1uum3d31]
Greetings. I am happy to present you my very first game created in Quest 5. Rather than trying to make an epic tale, I decided to create a room escape game with an emphasis on multiple endings (there are 9 ways to finish the game + game over if you run out of time) and rather dark humor. Any constructive criticism (whenever it is about the game or the language as I am Czech) is welcomed.

[quote:1uum3d31]
Story
Last math test made students very angry. In fact they are so angry they are about to break into your office and rip you a new one. Yes, you are a math teacher and you are about to die! You must act quickly. You do not have much time to escape...or solve it differently.[/quote:1uum3d31]

[url:1uum3d31]http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/v4k-jzocpe6xn8apr4q1ra/i-am-a-math-teacher-and-i-am-about-to-die[/url:1uum3d31]
Posts.HTML:
Greetings. I am happy to present you my very first game created in Quest 5. Rather than trying to make an epic tale, I decided to create a room escape game with an emphasis on multiple endings (there are 9 ways to finish the game + game over if you run out of time) and rather dark humor. Any constructive criticism (whenever it is about the game or the language as I am Czech) is welcomed.


Story
Last math test made students very angry. In fact they are so angry they are about to break into your office and rip you a new one. Yes, you are a math teacher and you are about to die! You must act quickly. You do not have much time to escape...or solve it differently.



http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/v4k-jzocpe6xn8apr4q1ra/i-am-a-math-teacher-and-i-am-about-to-die
